shortDescription: Unspecified vulnerability in JustSystems Ichitaro 13, 2004 through 2008, Lite2, and Ichitaro viewer 5.1.5.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted file, as exploited in the wild by Trojan.Tarodrop.H in March 2009.
vulnerabilityName: JustSystems Ichitaro 13, 2004 through 2008, Lite2, and Ichitaro viewer 5.1.5.0 and earlier Remote Code Execution
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
